      • getCredentials

        public static org.jets3t.service.security.AWSCredentials getCredentials(java.io.InputStream propertyFile)
                                                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Creates an AWSCredentials object based on the contents of an Input Property file. The fields should be named according to S3_ACCESS_KEY_PROPERTY_NAME and S3_SECRET_KEY_PROPERTY_NAME.
        Parameters:
        propertyFile - File containing the properties necessary for creating an AWSCredentials object.
        Returns:
        AWSCredentials object based on provided details.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        s3Properties - The settings to connect to S3.

        Throws:
        org.jets3t.service.S3ServiceException
